TEXT.TITLE: SERVICE RESOURCES <SRC> UNIT SETS PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Service Resources Corp's Chas. P. Young Co subsidiary said it agreed to acquire Atwell Fleming Printing Ltd, a Canadian financial printer, for about 3.2 mln dlrs. Young said the acquisition, which is expected to close in April, is subject to due dilligence review. Reuter
